messages.zh: 第五关（前）
messages.tl: Fifth level (front)

messages.zh: 果然一直在尾随我们吗，整合运动......！
messages.tl: Sure enough, we are always following us, Reunion Movement...!

messages.zh: 你们挣扎的样子，勾起我们的兴趣了。
messages.tl: The way you struggled, it evokes our interest.

messages.zh: 放着不管的话，你们就会像沟渠里的杂碎一样溜走。
messages.tl: If you leave it, you will slip away like the chop in the ditch.

messages.zh: ——一个也别想逃出去。
messages.tl: - Don't even want to escape.

messages.zh: 我们被包围了......！
messages.tl: We are surrounded by...!

messages.zh: 这个数量......究竟有多少暴徒藏匿在切城？！
messages.tl: This number... How many mobs are hiding in the city? !

messages.zh: ——动手。
messages.tl: - Hands-on.

messages.zh: ——狙击小队，瞄准敌方指挥官！
messages.tl: - Sniper squad, aim at the enemy commander!

messages.zh: 重装干员，防御姿态，向前顶上！
messages.tl: Reload the cadres, defend the posture, and move forward!

messages.zh: 等一下，等一下——
messages.tl: Wait a minute, wait a minute -

messages.zh: 这里已经是我的处理范围咯。
messages.tl: This is already my scope of treatment.

messages.zh: 该交给我了吧，弑君者？
messages.tl: Give it to me, Killer?

messages.zh: 你没有拒绝的理由吧？一些小虫子......值得你亲自追击吗？
messages.tl: You have no reason to refuse? Some little bugs... Is it worth your personal pursuit?

messages.zh: 随便你。
messages.tl: up to you.

messages.zh: 收队。
messages.tl: Receive the team.

messages.zh: ......这小子，是来战场上玩闹的吗？
messages.tl: ... Is this kid playing on the battlefield?

messages.zh: 你们在盘算什么？
messages.tl: What are you thinking about?

messages.zh: 抱歉，我都没来及和你们打招呼。
messages.tl: Sorry, I have not come and greeted you.

messages.zh: 毕竟刚开始你们并不是整合运动的目标。
messages.tl: After all, you are not the target of the Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 我叫梅菲斯特，是整合运动的领袖——
messages.tl: My name is Mephisto and I am the leader of the Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 你们的战斗我看的一清二楚。
messages.tl: I see your battle clearly.

messages.zh: 真的——十分有趣！
messages.tl: Really - very interesting!

messages.zh: 说战场的厮杀......有趣？
messages.tl: Said the battlefield's killing... interesting?

messages.zh: 我决定——要和你们，好好玩上一会儿才行~
messages.tl: I decided - I want to play with you for a while~

messages.zh: ......我们没工夫和小孩子浪费时间。
messages.tl: ... We have no time and a child to waste time.

messages.zh: ......刚刚那是什么？信号吗？
messages.tl: ...just what is it? Signal?

messages.zh: 与你无关。
messages.tl: Nothing to do with you.

messages.zh: 你们，是叫罗德岛吗。我还以为你们和账面上一样是制药公司呢。
messages.tl: You, is it Rhodes Island? I thought you were the same pharmaceutical company as the book.

messages.zh: 都是些企业人士了，连谈话时要注意礼节这个道理都不明白吗？
messages.tl: They are all business people. Do you even understand the etiquette when you talk?

messages.zh: 我没心情正眼看一个混球。
messages.tl: I am not in the mood to see a mixed ball.

messages.zh: 就是因为世上你这种混球越来越多，才导致我们不得不提防着点。
messages.tl: It is because of the growing number of mixed balls in the world that we have to be wary of it.

messages.zh: 是嘛。
messages.tl: Really.

messages.zh: 但是我不一样。
messages.tl: But I am different.

messages.zh: 我为之前对你们的轻视而向你道歉。
messages.tl: I apologize to you for the contempt for you.

messages.zh: 你们战斗的时候十分英勇，又非常懂得怎么取悦我！
messages.tl: You are very heroic when you fight, and you know how to please me!

messages.zh: 我们来玩个游戏吧。
messages.tl: Let's play a game.

messages.zh: ......你疯了？天灾要来了！再不撤出就逃不掉了——
messages.tl: ... are you crazy? The natural disaster is coming! If you don’t withdraw, you can’t escape it –

messages.zh: 你在说什么呢，迟钝兔子？
messages.tl: What are you talking about, dull rabbit?
Hey? !

messages.zh: 正因为是天灾啊......一个该庆祝的时刻——！现在，狩猎罗德岛的活动，正式开始啦。
messages.tl: Because it is a natural disaster... a moment of celebration -! Now, the activities of hunting Rhodes Island have officially begun.

messages.zh: 就用你们的血，来祝福切尔诺伯格即将焕然一新的绚烂时刻吧！
messages.tl: Use your blood to bless Chernobyl's new and exciting moment!

messages.zh: 哦哦！！哦哦哦！！！
messages.tl: Oh! ! Oh oh! ! !

messages.zh: 啐，这臭小子，脑袋里的东西搅成一团了吗？
messages.tl: Hey, is this stinky boy, what is in his head?

messages.zh: 但我也不是那种冷血的人......
messages.tl: But I am not the kind of cold-blooded person...

messages.zh: 所以我会给你们一个机会，一个允许你们暂时逃离命运的机会。
messages.tl: So I will give you a chance, an opportunity to allow you to temporarily escape from your destiny.

messages.zh: 接下来的战斗中，我不会出手~
messages.tl: In the next battle, I won’t shoot it~

messages.zh: 很仁慈吧？当然，就算你们现在想投降，也是不可能的哦。
messages.tl: Very kind? Of course, even if you want to surrender now, it is impossible.

messages.zh: 因为狩猎——已经开始了！
messages.tl: Because hunting - already started!

messages.zh: 各小队，战斗准备！！
messages.tl: The squads are ready to fight! !

messages.zh: 对了对了。
messages.tl: That's right.

messages.zh: 那个从核心区石棺里捞出来的家伙......非常、非常令人在意。
messages.tl: The guy who got out of the core area of ​​Shijieli... very, very care.

messages.zh: 你看起来......和我们有点不一样。
messages.tl: You look... a little different from us.

messages.zh: 来吧，罗德岛的虫子们，把这个家伙留给我吧？这样你们说不定还能先逃一会儿呢。
messages.tl: Come on, the bugs of Rhodes Island, leave this guy to me? So you may be able to escape for a while.

messages.zh: 博士——
messages.tl: Doctor -

messages.zh: ——退到我身后！！！！
messages.tl: - Retreat behind me! ! ! !
